amarikawen sapayena dolar biliyana kihipayak sandaha ho danata dakunu koriyawa samaga ekwa amarikawa karagena yana sanga්rama abhyasa nathara kirime poronduwa sandaha, thaman sathu upaya margika awi pahasuwen pasekin thabimata tharam uthuru koriyanu nayakaya nonjal nowe.
asuru karana samawayase aya athara pamanak nowa pasale, game, pansale hama denagema aadarayata lakwa siti isuru hemal hettiaarachchige samaja wapasariya itha pululya.

tharuna dharmapalathuma oolkat mathithuma (1875 niwyok nagaraye paramawignyanartha samithiye sabhapathi) lankawata paminimen anathuruwa ohuge bhasha pariwarthaka lesa katayuthu kaleya. 1891 di indiyawe mahabodhi pansalata wandana gamanaka yedi sitina atharathura anagarika dharmapala thuma rahath palayata pathwiya.
ee wagema mema nikaya godanangimata pujya ambaagahawaththe indasabhawara gnyanasama hamuduruwoth, ape game puwakdandawe panynyananda hamuduruwoth kala sewaya amathaka kirimata baha.

shilpa abhimani – 2016 ha athpehekam – 2016 pradarshanayanhi jayagrahaka jayagrahikawan sandaha sammana saha sahathika pathra padanaya shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye hitapu janadhipathini garu chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mathiniyage pradhanathwayen saha basnahira palath marga, prawahana, samupakara sanwardhana ha welanda niwasa ha idikirim,wathu yatithala pahasukam, karmantha ha grama sanwardhana garu amathya, lalith wanigarathna mathithumage sahabhagithwayen kolambaa sambuddhathwa jayanthi mandirayedi pawathwanu labiya.
